Summary

I am a web & HTTP specialist, computer scientist, programmer, open source advocate, and geek who is constantly researching and implementing new tech and methodologies. I thrive on learning, research, creating great web apps, streamlining UX, automating processes, and solving problems. I specialize in HTML, CSS/Less/Stylus, PHP, C, Node.js/io.js/JavaScript, and practitioner of C++, C#, Go, Python, Ruby, Rust, and Go.
